name: AI.Fashion
headline: AI.Fashion is the AI creative suite for the fashion industry.
description:
AI.Fashion is the AI creative suite for the fashion industry - modernizing the traditional design and go to market fashion processes with our advanced AI platform and design tools.

On the design side - our platform allows brands to create physically accurate digital versions of their unreleased clothing line before even beginning their productions processes, dramatically helping to reduce waste. 

And on the marketing side - we enable them to create photorealistic imagery of the clothing on a multitude of sizes, which creates a better experience for their customers because they have way more information about how the clothing will actually fit before they purchase.

founders.name: Daniel Citron, Founder
founders.description: Daniel is the CEO at AI.Fashion. He is also an award-winning filmmaker (Tribeca Film Festival, SFiFF, LAff) and creative technologist. Previously, Daniel spent time at Google (VR/AR), MIT (Artist in Residence 2019), and Harvard.

founders.name: John Chirikjian, Founder
founders.description: John is cofounder & CTO at AI.Fashion and specializes in creative tools & machines. John previously served as CTO at 3ayez (W18) and spent time at Yale and Microsoft.

## **Digitize** Your **Product Photography** Process
We use combination of AI and real models to create highly-customizable product photography at a fraction of the cost
[Click here to request a demo](https://www.ai.fashion/</sign-up>)
## Unlock **advanced personalization** capabilities
Increase conversion through enhanced localization and hypertargeting to reach and resonate with your target audiences more effectively across channels
[Click here to request a demo](https://www.ai.fashion/</sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27be78e18e98bfe5ce00_Frame%2014440.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27be78e18e98bfe5ce50_Frame%2014438.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bf78e18e98bfe5ced6_Frame%2014439.webp)
## How it works
1
Upload your clothing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27c178e18e98bfe5d00b_4.1.webp)
2
Choose a model from our library
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27b978e18e98bfe5c8a0_grid1%201.webp)
3
Deploy content across desired channels
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27c278e18e98bfe5d0a2_4.2.webp)
## Why AI.Fashion?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27c778e18e98bfe5d45e_Persona%20web%20-%2015.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bd78e18e98bfe5cdc6_Frame%2014434.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bd78e18e98bfe5cdd1_5887998_0000s_0002s_0001_Shape%201%20\(Traced\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27ba78e18e98bfe5ca95_camera.svg)
Exceptionally realistic AI photography before production.
Empower your decision-making process by A/B testing different assets
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27ba78e18e98bfe5c9d3_gallery_thumbnail.svg)
Unmatched quality and exclusive aesthetic customization.
We provide exceptional quality and customization, designed to meet your specific brand standards.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27ba78e18e98bfe5ca9a_screenshot_region.svg)
Hypertargeted product visuals localization.
Localize your product photography to different regions and audiences
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27b978e18e98bfe5c9bb_model_training.svg)
Human centered approach in the age of AI
Use real human models from locations all over the world in your AI-generated photography and support the modeling industry
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bd78e18e98bfe5cda8_Frame%2014433.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bd78e18e98bfe5cd93_1.svg)
## Cut your time and spend by 30-50%
From streamlined production to global collaboration with real human models, leverage AI to stay competitive and drive innovation in the fashion industry."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27ba78e18e98bfe5cb40_Frame%2014292.svg)
Reduce costs by 30%
Cut product photography and related expenses by 30% with AI enhanced processes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27ba78e18e98bfe5cb54_Frame%2014292.svg)
Increase Conversions by 25%
Enhance customer engagement and boost conversions with high quality, consistent AI-generated visuals
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27ba78e18e98bfe5cb54_Frame%2014292.svg)
50% faster
Accelerate your campaigns (product photo production process) with a 50% faster turnaround time using AI generated imagery.

## Why AI.Fashion?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27c778e18e98bfe5d45e_Persona%20web%20-%2015.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bd78e18e98bfe5cdc6_Frame%2014434.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65bc358c0915043214111984/665f27bd78e18e98bfe5cdd1_5887998_0000s_0002s_0001_Shape%201%20\(Traced\).svg)

Use real human models from locations all over the world in your AI-generated photography and support the modeling industry

From streamlined production to global collaboration with real human models, leverage AI to stay competitive and drive innovation in the fashion industry."

50% faster

generated_description:
AI.Fashion is an innovative player in the fashion industry, using AI to reshape the design and marketing processes. Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch, this Los Angeles-based startup offers a robust creative suite specifically tailored for fashion brands.

At its core, AI.Fashion aims to modernize traditional fashion workflows. On the design side, it lets brands create hyper-realistic digital representations of their unreleased clothing, allowing them to visualize and iterate their designs before production even starts. This proactive approach not only optimizes creativity but significantly reduces waste—a pressing issue in the fashion industry.

On the marketing front, AI.Fashion takes online shopping to a new level. Their platform generates photorealistic images of apparel that showcase fit and style across various sizes. This means customers can make more informed decisions, reducing return rates and enhancing overall satisfaction.

With a dedicated team of 11 and a mission to marry technology with creativity, AI.Fashion is tapping into the needs of a modern, eco-conscious market. They promise to cut photography costs by up to 30%, boost conversion rates by 25%, and speed up campaign production by 50%. These capabilities not only make the fashion process more efficient but also serve to elevate the brand's interaction with their audience.

Located in Los Angeles, AI.Fashion proudly uses a mix of AI technology and real human models, fostering an inclusive approach in an increasingly digital world. Their impact has attracted attention from major media outlets, validating their potential in the evolving landscape of fashion.

If you’re interested in seeing how they can transform your fashion projects, you can check them out at [AI.Fashion](https://www.ai.fashion).
